about: Hi there, i'm a Beginner in Sound-Design, but i am trying to learn and i love synthetic/synthesizer Sounds (like in Chiptunes and some Game-Soundtracks - mostly from the 8Bit and 16 Bit Era) and Orchestra Sounds (like in Movie- and some Game-Soundtracks). At the moment, i am learning Sounddesign from a Course (Book) (as a hobby) and hope to add some very cool sounds in the future, created with my Waldorf MicroQ Rack Virtual Analog Synthesizer (the blue one). If you use my Sounds, please let me know; i really want to know, if you find my Sounds usefull :) . Greetings, .Ingo. PS: And sorry, if my Comments sound sometimes a bit strange - that is because english is my second language.
